conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-fidelity 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation; wall thickness and heights are perfectly consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room adjacencies and proportions match the source 2D plan with high accuracy.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement captures almost all 2D items, including the kitchen island and specific seating arrangements.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with no artifacts; lighting is soft but clearly defines geometry.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window frames compared to 2D blueprint markings.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact floor plan layout, room proportions, and furniture placement.
